mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dag_node_execution ( workflow_instance_id, node_id, node_name, node_type, task_name, status, result, start_time, finished_time, skip_when_failed, enable, retry_times, worker_address ) VALUES ( #{workflowInstanceId}, #{nodeId}, #{nodeName}, #{nodeType}, #{taskName}, #{status}, #{result}, #{startTime}, #{finishedTime}, #{skipWhenFailed}, #{enable}, #{retryTimes}, #{workerAddress} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, workflow_instance_id, node_id, node_name, node_type, task_name, status, result, start_time, finished_time, skip_when_failed, enable, retry_times, worker_address, create_time, update_time FROM dag_node_execution WHERE workflow_instance_id = #{wfInstanceId} ORDER BY node_id

SELECT id, workflow_instance_id, node_id, node_name, node_type, task_name, status, result, start_time, finished_time, skip_when_failed, enable, retry_times, worker_address, create_time, update_time FROM dag_node_execution WHERE workflow_instance_id = #{wfInstanceId} AND node_id = #{nodeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE dag_node_execution SET status = #{status}, result = #{result}, finished_time = #{finishedTime}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, workflow_instance_id, node_id, node_name, node_type, task_name, status, result, start_time, finished_time, skip_when_failed, enable, retry_times, worker_address, create_time, update_time FROM dag_node_execution WHERE workflow_instance_id = #{wfInstanceId} AND status = 'RUNNING' ORDER BY start_time

SELECT id, workflow_instance_id, node_id, node_name, node_type, task_name, status, result, start_time, finished_time, skip_when_failed, enable, retry_times, worker_address, create_time, update_time FROM dag_node_execution WHERE workflow_instance_id = #{wfInstanceId} AND status = 'WAITING' ORDER BY node_id

SELECT id, workflow_instance_id, node_id, node_name, node_type, task_name, status, result, start_time, finished_time, skip_when_failed, enable, retry_times, worker_address, create_time, update_time FROM dag_node_execution WHERE worker_address = #{workerAddress} AND status = 'RUNNING' ORDER BY start_time
mapper.update:

status = #{status},
result = #{result},
start_time = #{startTime},
finished_time = #{finishedTime},

update_time = NOW()
